'''Craster's younger wife''' is a minor character in the [[Season 3|third season]]. She is played by [[Lisa Walsh]] and debuted in "[[Walk of Punishment]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
She is one of [[Craster]]'s daughters who he has married.
===[[Season 3]]===
She helps [[Craster's wife|another of Craster's wives]] with the delivering of [[Gilly]]'s [[Sam|baby]] while [[Samwell Tarly]] watches.<ref>"[[Walk of Punishment]]"</ref>
